original_text: Say ye to the righteous, that it shall be well with him: for they shall eat the fruit of their doings.
korean_text: 너희는 의인에게 복이 있으리라 말하라 그들은 그들의 행위의 열매를 먹을 것임이요

sentences.original_text: that it shall be well with him
for they shall eat the fruit of their doings
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 자기 행위의 열매를 먹을 것이기 때문이라
